main_section.title: ## Renan is a **front-end** and **mobile** developer
main_section.text: He builds scalable and efficient solutions using modern technologies.

quote_section.quote: The only way to go fast is to go well.
quote_section.author: - Robin C. Martin

about_section.title: about-me
about_section.text:
**Who am I?**

Hello, i’m Renan Theodoro!

I’m a Senior Software Developer with **over 10 years of experience** in **web and mobile** app development, I specialize in frameworks like **Flutter, React, Angular**, and **Vue.js**, focusing on **performance**, **scalability**, and **clean software architecture**.

I’m passionate about **Clean Code**, **SOLID principles**, and creating **maintainable**, **high-quality** solutions.

My skills extend to **API integration**, **state management**, and **full-stack development** with technologies like **Node.js, Firebase**, and **PHP**.

Currently, I’m expanding my expertise in **Next.js** and **React Native**.

**Let’s build something amazing together**!

contacts_section.title: contacts
contacts_section.text:
If you're seeking an **experienced software developer**, I'd love to connect and discuss how I can **contribute to your team**. With expertise in **front-end development**, **modern web frameworks**, and **mobile app development**, I'm confident in delivering **scalable**, **high-quality solutions**.

**Let’s connect and explore opportunities to work together!**

about_me_page.title: about-me
about_me_page.content:
**Who am I?**

With over **10 years of experience** in software development, I specialize in web and mobile applications using **Flutter, React, Angular**, and **Vue.js**. My focus is on **performance**, **scalability**, and **clean architecture**, delivering **high-quality**, **user-friendly experiences**.

I’m passionate about **Clean Code**, **SOLID principles**, and ensuring my code is **maintainable** and **scalable**. I also have experience with backend technologies like **Node.js**, **Firebase**, and **PHP**, allowing me to create **full-stack solutions**. Currently, I’m expanding my knowledge in **Next.js** and **React Native** to further enhance the applications I build.

**Let’s create something amazing together!**

fun_facts_section.title: my-fun-facts
fun_facts_section.fun_fact_1: I **play guitar** in my spare time
fun_facts_section.fun_fact_4: I know how to solve a Rubik's cube
fun_facts_section.fun_fact_5: My favorite game is **The Last of Us**
fun_facts_section.fun_fact_7: I believe in the power of **simplicity**, which is why **minimalism** influences me.
